title: PolyBTC
author: PolyBTC
content: Through the fud in your Forum regarding the long presale time and all, we broke up the Presale and started directly on Exchanges!!Our Roadmap Targets until end 2023 are with the next Exchange and the following Coinmarketcap Listing already fullfilled very soon.So, inderectly thanks for the fud.. We really come good forward and get great feedback from the exchanges.Until now (after 6/7 weeks) we got more then 7 agreements and still in negotiations and talk with some very good Partners in this direction. More infos we can not tell public to the current time.Currently we are on Mintme.com and Bankcex.comTokpie will follow in the next weeks, we got a fast progress now, so there we will give them all a bit time.Then also coingecko + cmc are coming. currently you can find us at livecoinwatch, blockspot or coinpaprika.Mintme is a new listed Coinmarketcap Exchange. PolyBTC is avaiable there under following Link:https://www.mintme.com/token/PolyBTC/tradeBankCEX is a fully listed Coinmarketcap Exchange, there we was going as second Exchange and you can find us there in the USDT and Ethereum Trading Pair.https://bankcex.com/exchange-base.html?symbol=PBTC_USDThttps://bankcex.com/exchange-base.html?symbol=PBTC_ETHDont forget to check our Website:https://polybtc.netAnd Join our Telegram and Social Media to stay up to date https://www.facebook.com/polybtcfacebook https://twitter.com/NewCrypto2023https://t.me/polybtcI guess thats enough for checking first. If got some Questions please drop us a Mail to: polybtc@outlook.comWe give our best to reply to you personally within 24 hours.Kind Regards

comments.author: PolyBTC
comments.body: Check everything legit waiting also for the reply from the mods here.Simply no way dear btctalk team. Can provide you everything what is needed + legit and nofake check is no problem...german passport, taxid... all no problem, in two weeks we got our belizean offshore. Then we can do something against these fudders here.For the normal People, simply check.And anyway, no stress, young token 6/7 weeks old. u guys will see.(not talking here... working.. check google already
